Rent a Space

Looking for a space for your workshop, meeting, or social gathering? Blixems has you covered with comfortable, versatile rooms.

Our spaces

  • Repairzaal, Bright, open workshop space ideal for hands‑on activities, repairs, and group projects. Equipped with basic tools and sturdy workbenches., details »

  • Grote Zaal, Large hall perfect for community events, dance classes, larger workshops, and social gatherings. Flexible layout options., details »

  • Gymzaal (halve), Half-size gym area suitable for sports activities, fitness classes, and movement workshops., details »

  • Hobby/Vergader Lokaal, Versatile room suitable for hobby clubs, meetings, and small group gatherings. Comfortable seating and table arrangements., details »
